code: import axios from'axios';var baseUrl="http://localhost:3001/api/persons";var getAllNumbers=function getAllNumbers(){var request=axios.get(baseUrl);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var addNewNumber=function addNewNumber(newNumber){var request=axios.post(baseUrl,newNumber);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var removeNumber=function removeNumber(id){var request=axios.delete("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(id));return request.then(function(response){return response;});};var replaceNumber=function replaceNumber(id,newNumber){var request=axios.put("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(id),newNumber);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};export default{getAllNumbers:getAllNumbers,addNewNumber:addNewNumber,removeNumber:removeNumber,replaceNumber:replaceNumber};
